name: LingSync Spreadsheet
description: Streamlined data entry for LingSync app; written in AngularJS.
content_security_policy: img-src 'self' https://ifielddevs.iriscouch.com; default-src 'self' https://ifielddevs.iriscouch.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://ifielddevs.iriscouch.com; connect-src 'self' https://ifielddevs.iriscouch.com ; object-src 'self' https://ifielddevs.iriscouch.com ; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://ifielddevs.iriscouch.com;
